attributes.action: Change the way the BBC is funded
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Citizens of the UK should have the right to chose if they want to have access to a TV station, they should not have it forced on them by law. At the moment even if someone never watches the BBC they still have to pay the licence fee of £139.50 just because they own a TV. A new system should be considered that means people only pay if they wish to access the BBC.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
